attributes.action: Limit fireworks to specific time window and designated locations
attributes.additional_details:
Health & Safety: Fireworks release toxic chemicals into the air and cause frequent noise-related stress, especially for people with PTSD, young children, and those with sensory sensitivities.
Distress to Animals: Loud fireworks terrify pets, disrupt wildlife, and stress livestock. Restricting them to set times and places will minimize anxiety and accidental harm to animals.
Environmental Impact: Fireworks produce chemical pollution, air contaminants, and litter, which harm natural habitats.
attributes.background: We propose restricting fireworks to major holidays like New Year’s Eve and Guy Fawkes Night, with displays only at approved locations and limited to a 1-2 hour window (10:00 PM to midnight). This would allow for festive celebrations while protecting the community, environment, and animal welfare.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petitions which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700537
